synopsis.text:
During an ordinary day at the Magician's Academy, a secret institution dedicated to teaching the magical arts and summoning, Takuto Hasegawa's life takes an unexpected turn. While practicing a summoning spell, he inadvertently brings forth a powerful magical entity, Tanarotte. This enchanting creature pledges her unwavering loyalty to Takuto, who names her and becomes responsible for her well-being.

As a student living a double life between Earth and the Magician's Academy, Takuto now faces the challenge of caring for Tanarotte, who possesses the ability to disrupt the delicate balance of power between the god and demon realms. With representatives from both sides seeking to eliminate Tanarotte, Takuto must navigate through a series of provocative and revealing situations while trying to maintain his academic pursuits.

Unbeknownst to Takuto, his actions will lead him to attract more scantily-clad women in need of his protection, further complicating his life at the academy. Join Takuto and Tanarotte in this enthralling tale filled with magic, loyalty, and a touch of ecchi, as they embark on a journey that will determine the fate of two realms.
